title: The Owl who married a goose: an Eskimo legend
creator_credit: Caroline Leaf, Pierre Moretti and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An Eskimo legend of a goose that captures the fancy of an owl. Although the voices are in Inuktitut Caroline Leaf’s innovative animation leave no doubt as to the happenings that transpire. It is a story with wry humour characteristic of many Inuit tales, for audiences young and old. Editing, Pierre Lemelin. (Eight awards, including Oscar nomination, Hollywood.)
